idleIcon - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.gui.DesktopApplication1View
 
init_instructions - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.DelayFunction
instructions used to do some initializing such as storing some values of elements on stack so they may be recovered at later times, while the instructions get to utilize those required elements
init_instructions - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Loop
a group of instructions used to initialize a variable/register, this determines the iterations done over the other instruction groups does not influence significantly the time to execute the loop directly but by value, *IMPORTANT NOTICE: must be present for the loop to function properly

insert(Executable) - Method in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup
used when we want an executable to be added to this group as the first Executable in the current sequence
Instruction - Class in ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator
a single instruction defined in the instruction set manual
Instruction(String) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Instruction
a constructor that only sets the instruction op-code, use when you don't know the duration, or the duration doesn't matter
Instruction(String, int) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Instruction
a full all-fields constructor
instruction_code - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Instruction
the code that fully describes this instruction
instruction_code - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionData
instruction code as seen in assembler compiler
instruction_set - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.CodeBuilder
specifies the instruction set, i.e.
instruction_set - Static variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionSet
the only instance of the instruction set that will ever be used
InstructionData - Class in ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator
used to represent the instructions constituting ones instructions set Completely describes one instruction by specifying the following information: 1) instruction code as seen in assembler compiler 2) duration in T states 3) size in bytes 4) REGS affected 5) number of memory locations needed 0, or 2 6) is the stack pointer read or changed, and/or is the stack contents changed 7) is this instruction free to be used from the auto-generating code builder the information 4-6 will be represented by a single object of the class Elements *IMPORTANT NOTICE: this is different then the Instruction class that represents an abstract formulation of an executable command in an assembler compiler.
InstructionData(String) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionData
use this constructor to make an InstructionMetadata object from the description read from a text file the format of the data represented is given in the text file
InstructionGroup - Class in ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator
a group of instructions defined in the instruction set manual
InstructionGroup() - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup
default constructor, initialize the instructions to an empty array
InstructionGroup(ArrayList) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup
default constructor, initialize the instructions to a the instruction array param
InstructionGroup(ArrayList<InstructionData>, Element, Element) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup

InstructionGroup(Executable) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup
a shortcut constructor for creating a single instruction groups
instructions - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionSet
all the instructions that make up this instruction set, fully described as stated in the InstructionMetadata class
instructions_available - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.CodeBuilder
out of all the instructions in the instruction set only a subset are available concerning the elements of the mP our delay function is allowed to use, this array list contains only those instructions, they are the instructions that will be used when generating out delay function
InstructionSet - Class in ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator
object containing all the instructions and their definitions, as defined in the manual
InstructionSet(String) - Constructor for class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionSet
private constructor only to be invoked from the getInstance method for the first initialization of the instruction set
instuctions - Variable in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionGroup
the group of instructions stored in an array list to provide dynamic adding and removing instructions the order does not matter and does not have to be maintained
isAvailable(Elements) - Method in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.Elements
a function used to separate available instructions from the whole instruction set, it checks whether the given comparator object contains all the resources required for a given instruction to execute
isAvailable(Elements) - Method in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionData
a function used to separate available instructions from the whole instruction set, it checks whether the given comparator object contains all the resources required for a given instruction to execute
isTo_use() - Method in class ukim.finki.mps.delay_function_generator.InstructionData

the number of iterations this loops is supposed to process through before exiting, this value is the same as the init value in the init_instrucion
